title: In game chat limit = good or shiit ?
body:
Hi guys so has anyone else noticed that the in game chat limit ban is like leaver buster its a automatic ban 
regardless you have done or haven't done anything. I Can confirm no one is monitoring the reports it just goes straight into a chat ban... been reported mutiple times for language/abuse apprently not a single word said in game..... = BAN ?....Anyone else getting sick and fed up of the chat limit thingy ? 
I personally wouldn't give 2 shiits about it if they didnt take away the ability to talk in all' because when you get a team of morons regardless you're in the wrong or right and they start to talk shit then spam report blah blah blah and make up random crap to try and get you reported you cant defend yourself ? so you have to sit there for 40 min or so then maybe get another 1-2 + reports on top from the other team because you cant talk in all and defend yourself...  because some scrub got butt hurt... just about every game i play always 1-2 people having a sook about something...

what's everyone else take on the chat limit ban thingy..

replies.body: I ignore everything my team says anyway so it makes no difference
